exercises.description: Apply Equal depth binning to solve a real-world problem

learning_objectives: Understand the fundamentals of Equal depth binning
Apply Equal depth binning in practical scenarios
Implement solutions using Equal depth binning
sections.background: Bins are divided according to the number of rows of records, each bin has the same number of records, and the number of records in each bin is called the weight of the bin, also known as the depth of the bin.

metadata.concept_definition: Bins are divided according to the number of rows of records, each bin has the same number of records, and the number of records in each bin is called the weight of the bin, also known as the depth of the bin.
